original_text: And of this measure shalt thou measure the length of five and twenty thousand, and the breadth of ten thousand: and in it shall be the sanctuary and the most holy place.
korean_text: 이 측량한 가운데에서 길이는 이만 오천 척을 너비는 만 척을 측량하고 그 안에 성소를 둘지니 지극히 거룩한 곳이요

sentences.original_text: shalt thou measure the length of five and twenty thousand
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이만 오천의 길이를 측량할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the breadth of ten thousand:
and in it shall be the sanctuary
